output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. CMF Number: - No CMF number is visible, but this isn't decisive
2. Refers to candidate: - Yes, explicitly mentions "George Simion PREȘEDINTE" - George Simion is candidate #2 on the presidential ballot
3. Addresses wide population: - Yes, targets a large audience (estimated 100,001-500,000 people) - Uses paid advertising on Facebook and Instagram - Uses inclusive language ("Românii au ocazia")
4. Electoral objective: - Clear electoral objective with "De ce e nevoie de George Simion PREȘEDINTE?" - Explicitly promotes candidacy for presidency - Calls for political change through elections - Presents the elections as a "unique chance" to change the country
5. Journalism: - This is not journalistic content - It's clearly campaign material promoting a candidate - No balanced reporting or informative content
6. Personal opinion: - This is not a personal opinion but an organized campaign message - Paid distribution indicates organized campaign activity

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Explicitly promotes George Simion for president - Uses paid distribution to reach a wide audience - Has clear electoral objective - Calls for action in presidential elections - Is not journalistic or educational in nature
conclusion.message-for-police: AUR - Sălașu de Sus, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material de propaganda electorala pentru candidatul George Nicolae Simion la functia de presedinte al Romaniei dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala. Materialul publicitar, cu ID-ul 2006851919778923, promovat pe Facebook si Instagram dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, contine mesaje directe de sustinere a candidaturii ("De ce e nevoie de George Simion PREȘEDINTE?") si indeamna in mod explicit la schimbarea politica prin alegeri ("șansa unică de a schimba cu adevărat această țară"), reprezentand astfel o continuare a propagandei electorale in afara perioadei legale permise. Efectul electoral este evident prin targetarea unui public larg (100,001-500,000 persoane) si utilizarea unui buget semnificativ pentru promovare (300-399 RON).
